title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CPU/GPU runner for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other GGUF models with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, create and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLM and Chat components for chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like) with multi-user, model manager, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: oll4ma (OpenAI adapter)
summary: Lightweight proxy that translates OpenAI-style requests to Ollama so existing apps require zero code change.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in <100 lines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code completion and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialised wrapper that fine-tunes & serves chemistry-domain Llama models via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector & PVC support.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service for chat, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC server shim exposing Ollama generate/chat/embed operations over protobuf for high-performance clients.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via mentions or app-home.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI plug-and-play template for Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django REST app exposing Ollama as an internal microservice with JWT auth and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for specialised fine-tunes (code, medical, role-play, etc.).
